g.text: 1.3. DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to DFSP2 - Prepare Position Failure
Routes & Publishes Prepare event for Payer
Ensures that event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Responds replication acknoledgements have been received
Consumes Prepare event message for Payer
Request to persist event information (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Validates from - Payer (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Validates to - Payee (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Validates duplicate Check (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Validates message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement) (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Routes & Publishes Position event for Payer
Consumes Position event message for Payer
Request to persist event information (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Persist Prepare Transfer State with transferState='pending' (refer to 1.1 for detail)
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieves latest position from DB for Payer
Calculates latest position (lpos) by incrementing transfer for prepare
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Persist Transfer State with transferState='ABORTED' on position check failure
Publishes Notification (failure) event for Payer (handled by seperate process)
Requests to persist event information - POST - HTTP://events/
Requests Notification details for Payer - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to Payer
